findings.title: Max transaction amount and wallet amount can be set to zero can be used to pause transactions
findings.description: Owner can update max transaction amount and max wallet amount with an indefinite amount, which can be set to zero and potentially pause transactions.

findings.title: Reentrancy Attack
findings.description: Functions `_transfer` Reentrancy detected through external calls.

findings.title: A Floating Pragma is Set
findings.description: The compiler version should be a fixed one to avoid undiscovered compiler bugs.

findings.title: Presence of Unused Variable
findings.description: Unused variables can cause unnecessary gas consumption, suggest poor code quality and indicate bugs or malformed data structures.

findings.title: SafeMath Override
findings.description: SafeMath is no longer needed starting Solidity v0.8+. The compiler now has Built-in overflow checking.
